content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>City and County of Denver, Public Works Policy and Planning</origin>         <pubdate>20120620</pubdate>         <title>Business Improvement Districts</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>An organizational petition shall be signed by persons who own real or personal property in the service areaof the district having an assessed value of not less than 50% of the assessed value of all real and personal property in the district, and who own at least 50% of the acreage in the district as filed in the City Clerk and City Council offices.City Council approves the petition by ordinance, organizing the BID and defining the boundaries</abstract>       <purpose>Business Improvement Districts (BID) are allowed to acquire, construct, finance, install, and operate improvements including streets, sidewalks, curbs, gutters, pedestrian malls, streetlights, utilities, drainage facilities, landscaping, decorative structures, statuaries, fountains, identification signs, traffic safety devices, bicycle paths, off-street parking facilities, benches, rest rooms, information booths, public meeting facilities, and all necessary appurtenances.</purpose>       <supplinf>Property owners within the districts pay a special assessment over and above the normal property tax to support maintenance of streetscape features in the district.</supplinf>     </descript>     <timeperd>       <timeinfo>         <sngdate>           <caldate>unknown</caldate>         </sngdate>       </timeinfo>       <current>Unknown</current>     </timeperd>     <status>       <progress>In work</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.053210</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.935255</eastbc>         <northbc>39.756141</northbc>         <southbc>39.696677</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>Business Improvement District</themekey>         <themekey>BID</themekey>         <themekey>Business</themekey>         <themekey>Improvement District</themekey>         <themekey>Creation Boundary</themekey>         <themekey>Ordinance</themekey>         <themekey>Tax Districts</themekey>         <themekey>Assessments</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>boundaries</themekey>         <themekey>economy</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:  This dataset is provided as read-only and is restricted to City and County of Denver employees for official City business only.  Contact the GIS Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions.  USE CONSTRAINTS:  The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES </useconst>     <datacred>Public Works Capital Projects Management and Public Works Surveying.</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>RESTRICT - 1</secsys>       <secclass>Restricted</secclass>       <sechandl>Read access to all City users via LVM (Locate View Map). Data available to those with access to SDE layers.</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.5.4400</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual />   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>GT-polygon composed of chains</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>9</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>business_improvement_districts</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>Shape</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DISTRICT_ID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Arbitrary sequential number for districts determined by IPP.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>SURVEY</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DISTRICT_NAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Name of District per Creation Ordinance</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Creation Ordinance</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DATA_SOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Where did the feature come from. Was it mapped by survey or did it come from an existing feature class.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>SURVEY</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CREATION_ORDINANCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Ordinance that created the district.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>From Ordinance</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>FILE_LINK</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Link to City Network File Folder</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Folder Created by Brendan Kelly</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>WEB_LINK</attrlabl>         <attrdef>URL for District Information</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Per Brendan Kelly</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>TAX_NUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Various Tax Code numbers for GIS processing</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Assessor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LEGAL_START_DATE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Date of Ordinance that created this district.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>See creation ordinance</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LEGAL_END_DATE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Date district was terminated.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>See termination documents</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMMENTS_DISTRICT_SPECIFIC</attrlabl>         <attrdef>District Comments</attrdef>         <attrdefs>As supplied</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMMENTS_LEGISLATIVE_PROCESS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Comments specific to legislative creation of district.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Brendan Kelly</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>BNDRY_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Date boundary was last modified.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>GIS editor.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>WEB_LINK_STATE_DOLA</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Link to District Web Site at State of Colorado</attrdef>         <attrdefs>DOLA - Department of Local Affairs</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NOTES</attrlabl>         <attrdef>General Information</attrdef>         <attrdefs>GIS editor</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SPECIAL_FEE_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Special fees associated with district</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City Treasury Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GlobalID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A field of type UUID (Universal Unique Identifier) in which values are automatically assigned by the geodatabase when a row is created. The GlobalID field is necessary for maintaining object uniqueness across replicas. All feature classes and tables participating in one-way or two-way replication must contain the GlobalID field. This field is not editable and is automatically populated when it is added for existing data. </attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>Active_or_Historic</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Is the District boundary "Active" or "Historical"?</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Survey</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE_Length</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Length of feature in internal units.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE_Area</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Area of feature in internal units squared.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / DenverGIS Data</cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301 </address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>USA</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237 </cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am - 4:30pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20150319</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
